articles.author: Gabe Hiatt, Natalie B. Compton, Andrea Sachs
articles.title: National parks announce ‘America-first’ upcharges for foreign visitors - The Washington Post
articles.description: The National Park Service's new America-first pricing policy will see foreign visitors pay more to access popular national parks, including Yellowstone and the Grand Canyon.
articles.content:
The National Park Service is introducing a digital annual pass that charges foreign visitors $170 more than United States residents across the federal recreation system.
According to a news release … [+154 chars]
